metadata.title: CVE-2023-1436 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An infinite recursion is triggered in Jettison when constructing aJSONArray from a Collection that contains a self-reference in one of itselements. This leads to a StackOverflowError exception being thrown.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjettison-java - 1.5.3-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjettison-java package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.3-1ubuntu0.1').
